Configure Project/Access Control Database

Use the Configure Project dialog box (Admin | Configure Project | General Tab | Security | Access Control Database) to specify an access control database for Serena ChangeMan Version Manager to use.

Field Descriptions

Security | Access Control Database
Access Control Database Enter the location of an existing access control database. Or, click Use an existing access control database to browse for the location of an existing database.
Create a new access control database Click this button to create a new access control database in the archive directory of the project database or project. Version Manager copies the default access control database to this location.
Use an existing access control database Click this button to select an existing access control database.
Duplicate an existing access control database Click this button to create a new access control database duplicated from an existing database that you select.
Enable access control database security Select this check box to enable the database. Otherwise, the access control database will be defined in the configuration file but will not be used (enabled) for security.
